item.title: ML Summary Series (1) - Concepts
item.description: Machine learning (ML) is by no means new to me. I took ML courses in college and in grad school. In college, I was also in a study group where we went through Bishopâ€™s PRML chapter by chapter. Later when I became a PhD, I use machine learning in plenty of projects, from the visualization of data after dimensional reduction through PCA, to building prediction models with logistic regression, random forest, support vector machines, etc.
